name: We Need A Hero
description:
We need a Hero - LD37 Compo Entry

=================================

Super Hero Control Room Simulator

=================================

You are Oracle! Or at least, you are in the Super Hero Control Room of Big Deal City.

Manage and hire new Heroes with FAME Points! Assign them to difficult missions and watch

them succeed! Or maybe fail?

========

Controls

========

- Click things with the left Mouse Button

- Hold the right Mouse Button to pan around the Map

- Use the Scroll Wheel to zoom

- ESCAPE: Brings up the Manual, also includes the Exit Game Button

- SPACE: Toggle Pause Mode

===============

How To Play

===============

Please read the ingame Manual. It opens automatically when you start the game.

Tools

=================================

Game Engine: Unity 5

Graphics: Adobe Illustrator

Questions, Bugs, everything? Write a comment, or write me a mail at ludumdare@dizelabs.com

Thanks for playing and have a nice day :-)

Thomas Diehl
